markdownRemark.html: As a capstone project for my degree at Temple University, me and 5 friends endeavored to build a card game whose collectible “cards” were really tokens on an Ethereum blockchain. In this post I’ll try to break down what we did right, mistakes we made, and things that I learned along the way.
